newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Cordiant expands Sri Lanka operations.
newsitem.headline: Cordiant expands Sri Lanka operations.

text.p: British communications group Cordiant Plc, which has an advertising affiliate in Sri Lanka, is expanding operations to include public relations, an official from the local company said on Friday.

Rowland Worldwide, a subsidiary of Cordiant Plc, will provide public relations and communications management through Colombo advertising firm Strategic Alliance from December 1996, Nimal Guneardena, managing director of the local company, told Reuters.
Advertising firm Bates Worldwide, another Cordiant subsidiary, has been affiliated with Strategic Alliance since December 1993.

"We hope to introduce areas like issues and crisis management, financial and investors relations managment to Sri Lanka, which has grown to believe that public relations is simply getting media coverage for clients," Gunewardena said.
